Overview

The Content

  • Personal Growth

Screenshot

Links

My process

Built with

  • Semantic HTML5 markup
  • CSS custom properties
  • Flexbox
  • CSS Grid
  • 11ty - Static Site Generator
  • Decap CMS - Headless Netlify CMS

Useful resources

  • Eleventy - This amazing static site generator made it possible to build this site.
  • Nunjucks - This amazing templating language helped me create some navigation functionality and some layouts.
  • Decap Widgets - Decap works with widgets to provide some ui in your cms.
  • Google Fonts - This helped me find a good looking font for this web page.

Folder Structure

.
├── _data
    └── navigation.js
├── _includes
    └── layouts
├── admin
    ├── config.yml
    └── index.html
├── categories
    ├── code
    ├── community
    ├── growth
    ├── remote_work
    └── categories.json
├── filters
├── images
    └── uploads
├── js
├── posts
├── .eleventy.js
├── .gitignore
├── posts.njk
├── search-index.json.njk
├── package-lock.json
├── package.json
└── README.md

Install dependencies

npm install

Working locally

Starts watch tasks to compile when changes detected

npm start

Creating a production build

npm run build
